title: Massive Lag?
body:
I have been asking in game and it seems a lot of people are experiencing some hindering lag... Yesterday and today my MS went up to 11k!!! Of course the game crashed and I could not continue the matches because I couldn't even log in.
If it is not a huge massive spike, there is continuous, random spiking from 80-300 ms.
Any insight on to why this is? I have shadows off and the graphics quality as low as it can be.
My internet is setup specifically for gaming (ports, dmz, etc), so it is not my internet and I know that other people are having this same issue.
Thanks

replies.body: Lag spikes like suggests an unstable connection or packet loss.  I recommend running a [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader), which can help find what went wrong as well as provide some troubleshoot steps.  Hope it helps!
For some reason ever since this new patch I've had FPS issues :(

I agree with this post. The lag is unreal. Makes the game completely playable.  Running around with random frames. This last match I just played was super bad with lag. (The ping number doesnt even rise), but it's like I everything is in a standstill, but you can see your health dropping when attacked etc. This is ruining the game.  I am actually debating quitting league at this point.
